name: The Q
description:
The Q is a short horror game that a  player becomes a subject of a mysterious experiment done by a suspicious group The Q.  

!! Disclaimer : This is an Alpha Build of TheQ . Press E to interact, but make sure you are not in animation (like walking).  You might have to press E key more than once Trigger boxes are not detecting the player properly; it is kind of buggy. This version includes two endings. Enjoy !!!

(This is a (likely) mini-game for my personal project + Thesis for graduation. All of my project shares similar story+universe+setting)
